testcase.title: to verify Check box status to be retain on breadcrumb actions

steps.title: the page "Home" should be loaded on log on
I click on "Explore Menu" link on new Home Page

substeps.message: Competitive Intelligence is displayed as expected

steps.title: I check that "Competitive Intelligence" is open and coloured "green"

substeps.message: Competitive landscape viewer picture is displayed

steps.title: I click on "Competitive landscape viewer" picture tile

substeps.message: Competitive Landscape Viewerreport page is displayed

steps.title: I navigate to "Competitive Landscape Viewer" page
I click on tab "Indication" in 'CI Landscape' page
I input a Query "cancer" into the "Indication" Look up text box in 'CI Landscape'
I click on 'Look-Up' button of tab "Indication" on 'CI Landscape' page
I verify autocomplete suggestion is displayed for tab "Indication" on 'CI Landscape' look up

substeps.message: Required term Adenoid tumor was selected from Autocomplete

steps.title: I select "Adenoid tumor" from the suggestions displayed in "Indication" tab on 'CI Landscape' look up
I verify "Clinical Trials" Accordian with title "Clinical Trials" is displayed on 'CI Landscape' page

substeps.message: + icon on Clinical Trials accordion is clicked

steps.title: I click on '+' icon on "Clinical Trials" Accordion on 'CI Landscape' page
I check in the check box 'Ongoing Only' in 'Clinical Trials' accordion on 'CI Landscape' page

substeps.message: Accordion Title Is Updated With Filters onClinical Trials

steps.title: I verify that the "Clinical Trials" title is updated with 'with filters applied'

substeps.message: 'Ongoing Only check box is  as expected.

steps.title: I verify that 'Ongoing Only' option is "Selected" on 'CI Landscape' page
I click on the "clinical trials" count link on 'CI Landscape' page

substeps.message: Report type 'Clinical Trials' is only available on 'Results' page.

steps.title: Only report type "Clinical Trials" is available on 'Results' page

substeps.message: Bread crumb button 'Back' button tooltip option Competitive Landscape Viewer is clicked

steps.title: I selects option "Competitive Landscape Viewer" within tooltip from breadcrumb button 'Back'
I verify "Clinical Trials" Accordian with title "Clinical Trials" is displayed on 'CI Landscape' page

substeps.message: 'Ongoing Only check box is  as expected.

steps.title: I verify that 'Ongoing Only' option is "Selected" on 'CI Landscape' page
